post.title: Assassination attempt on Princess Pinguicula by the cat
post.body:
This morning the cat has tore the plant from the pot by it's long flower stem, then dragged it out of a container, and down to the floor.

Since the beast is chewing so loud on dried stuff (the flower was dried already, gladly, or I'd kill the monster on the spot) that I could hear it from the only good dream I had in many months.

I thought it was some plastic, but instead, found small soft green body of a plant on the ground.

I've put it back now, but I can barely hope it will do anything. There were a few living roots left, so there is a TINY chance the plant will live yet.

post.title: Snails are getting smarter? O_O
post.body:
Smart animals are our blessing and a curse: Snails fist discovered that if they run around like crazy, I get worried, open the lid and bring tastier food.

Now they have also learned that even when I don't look at them, they can attract food by chewing at breathing holes of the box, making loud scratching sounds.

I'm scared of what would a fish come up with o_O Bang the aquarium with it's head? Jump out of it? That would be fun.

...or ants! Need to buy ants!

post.title: H2O2
post.body:
DON'T use hydrogen peroxide for mucous membranes, AKA mouthwash, without reading the instruction.

And no, being engineer and knowing how to use it for rocket fuel still doesn't mean you can do that.

Either it will kill you, or your wife will. I was saved (barely), but you may not be so lucky.

## Jocking aside...
...you can mouthwash with 2.5 mg/ml solution, or dilute 30mg/ml peroxide solution with water at a ratio of 1 to 11.

EDIT: I've replaced "%" with mg/ml.

post.title: ZN Idea: More filter possibilities: content warnings
post.body:
I've got an idea how to give people a way NOT to block each other if someone post some content they may not want to read. Content descriptions or content warnings - even if simple tags are parsed, they can be used to mute only particular topics.

The idea came to my head because there are some cool interesting people, that post some politics, and I just really-really don't want to read about it. I'd hate to block people because of it, even for some time.

post.title: I've beaten my covid!
post.body:
Well, kind of. I had a distortion of taste because of my covid last January, and for about 10 months I could not eat most food. Bland macaroni diet has worn me out, and lack of tasty stuff has driven me into a state when I just didn't care much about things one way or another.

BUT! A few days ago I've found out that I can use peanuts (which are distorted in a milder way) to blunt the distortion to complete(?) nothingness!

For a while now I knew that if I keep eating stuff that I have problems with (and don't puke somehow), the taste will come to normal for a short duration. That's how I've once eaten kebab and another time even pizza was almost normal!

But I've recently found out that some food works better as a fixer and all that was left for me was to stumble upon a cheap and good one. Peanuts! (and possibly lots and lots of stress, but let's hope the former is enough...)

1-2 days ago I've eaten peanuts for breakfast because it was almost 16:00 and I was quite hungry, as you might imagine. And then it struck me that even though I had trouble with the first couple of nuts, all the rest were tasty and nice! So without any delay I've opened a chocolate bar and started chewing. And it was SO GREAT! I haven't tasted a good real chocolate for almost a year! 10 months! And this one was a giant chocolate bar of quite decent quality, nuts and orange (present, but not too much of it).

Today was the day I've finally beaten one of 2 worst nemeses - coffee. For this whole time I could be used to determine if the coffee was real or just some crap-shit mix. Real coffee literally caused me to either faint or puke depending on how much I wanted either one of these. But with the help of super peanuts I've just drunk a cup of coffee and cream and even kind of enjoyed it! It's a complete victory! And I have to say that peanuts go quite good with almost anything, especially coffee. So it's a win-win))

Next item on the list will be eggs. Even thinking of them made my head hurt, but  I have to try it. If I can eat eggs, or at least chicken, it will make my wife happy almost more than it will make me happy myself xD

post.title: Casey's recent achievements
post.body:
The most recent thing I've seen is how she interacts with phones and tablets: she started to use toes on her paws, opening them wide, instead of closing as if to grab the thing that is displayed in the game.

Since it's less natural, I think she saw that in our interaction with the touch screens, we press on them instead of grabbing. (Touch is a more accurate term for the interaction, since the screen reacts to finger's capacity, but I'd expect a cat to think of it as a pressure application.

Yes, before this day, she used to grab the screen, trying to catch the image.

To be continued when I'm not on the phone..)

post.title: My new predator plants (first days)
post.body:
My prime reason to be searching for a blog platform is that I now have a couple of predator plants! (not sure it's a correct name in English, but anyway..) So obviously my first more or less informative post here will be about them üòÅ

They are Mexican Pinguicula and Nepenthes. Yeah, we really wanted Venus Flytrap, but we were told she's a bitch when it comes to holding it at home. Drosera was one of our choices, but first two seemed like the best plants for a beginner.

The first thing we were told to do was to name them, then to find them a good spot, put them there and not to touch for a few days. And to never ever move them from this spot.

The first task was hard, because I don't like to come up with names, but with help of my wife, we now have Princess Pinguicula and Count Johny Nepenthes. You may guess that Alex helped me with the latter one twice as much xD

Next task - find a place. Preferably an eastern window, (NOT southern), and most certainly not kitchen. BUUUT.... we only have southern windows. And a spot only in the kitchen. So it's not a perfect spot, but something to start with... It's always possible to add shading and keep the window partially open when Alex is cooking, right?

Then I've started reading the manual in detail. And OH NO, they are totally different. One grows in the sunny Mexican tropics, and the other one in the cold mountains of somewhere...

Of the two of them, Princess should be the least capricious, so the temperature and humidity were selected somewhere in between, closer Nepenthes. But very soon Pinguicula went into cold shock and we had to MOVE them apart.

With all 3 first rules kinda broken, I spent several days dancing around them, buying stuff like lamps, moss and distilled water to make their life bearable.

post.title: Arch on LVM
post.body: ClearNet links: [Arch Linux](https://www.archlinux.org/) LVM I'm gonna try to install Arch Linux, and will write about my progress here. As usually I will look into comments section from time to time. #Planning 1. make a live USB stick 2. Make partitions ``` Planned partitions: sda 2 TB GPT |---- 100M fat32 /boot As far as I understand, I should do it this way. |---- 1T lvm2 pv Main partition | |- 20G / root | |- 10G /var ?? | |- 5G /tmp ?? | |- 900G /home Home sweet home. | `- 5G swap 4G memory + 1G coz I have 2 TB HDD. `---- ~1T NTFS D:\ For windows games. sdb 1,5TB MBR |- 500G NTFS C:\ Windows `- empty For the time when I need it most. sdc 2TB MBR - 2 NTFS and 200-500G unalocated. My old drive. Mostly works as a metronome now. But my files are still there. ``` 3) mount partitions 4) install OS 5) profit? #Acting ##Phase 1. ###USB stick. On notebook: `cd /home/mk/Downloads/qbt` `lsblk` `sudo -s` `umount /dev/sdb*` `dd bs=4M if=archlinux-2016.08.01-dual.iso of=/dev/sdb status=progress && sync` ##Phase 2. ### Partitioning. On PC: ``` lsblk or fdisk -l gdisk #next is from memory, so might be incorrect (gdisk) /dev/sda (gdisk) o # create new gpt label (gdisk) y # yes, do create, please. (gdisk) n # create new partition... (gdisk) 1 # ...number 1 (gdisk) +1M # that starts at 1MB (gdisk) +512M # and ends 512 MB later (gdisk) ef02 # type is BIOS boot partition (dunno if it's right) (actually, I'm not sure if this one is needed at all xD ) (gdisk) n (gdisk) 2 (gdisk) +1M (gdisk) +1T (gdisk) 8e00 # the type is Linux LVM this time ``` I've also checked alignment with `parted /dev/sda align-check optimal 1` and `... 2`, but I'm not sure that any disk tool is aligning partitions wrong. ###LVM creation: ``` pvcreate /dev/sda2 vgcreate sys /dev/sda2 lvcreate -n root -L20G sys lvcreate -n usr -L10G sys lvcreate -n var -L10G sys lvcreate -n tmp -L5G sys lvcreate -n swap -L5G sys lvcreate -n home -L400G sys lvcreate -n steam -L550G sys # visualize with: pvdisplay # or pvs vgdisplay # or vgs lvdisplay # or lvs # or just lsblk ``` ----- The current state is this: I've saw white stripes on the screen and have decided that something is wrong with the video card, but then followed those stripes out of the screen, and when they reached the keyboard, I've decided to go to bed. Plus somehow Mozart in my player turned into music of 1090-x... Have I been setting Arch for **that** long? I mean... I've only started! Have I started? I haven't even mounted anything! =( Sleep.

post.title: Qubes OS
post.body: ~~_In progress. I'll add stuff here as I explore this OS_~~ _I want to try something different. If you want more info on this topic, comment._ https://www.qubes-os.org/ # The first day _It took me quite a while to update all the VMs it had. But now when I finally have done it, I can install apps I need. By the way, I write this from Qubes =D_ It's hot. But it gives me headaches all the time. It's the first OS that I had to read about before using even the GUI part of it. May be old people feel this way about things easy and obvious for me? # Feels secure ### "What do you think of it?" People are asking me "What do you think about Qubes?" The best answer I could think of is this: it does what it was made for. It seem to be the most secure OS I've ever used (or may be even seen). It requires much more care than Ubuntu-like OSes that I've used before. It takes brains just to update it (you have to understand what is what, how it works and why it does not work). And it takes quite a lot of memory to run all VMs that I want to run. And most surely I won't be able to play games here, but I'll surely try =)))) Great news, by the way: it really works. It's not a concept, it's a product. # Quite beautiful I'm not a designer, but I require stuff on my screen to be beautiful. At least, because that's what I'm staring at a lot. Qubes looks good. I'm **very** glad of that!

post.title: "WHY?!!"
post.body:
SO... It is decided then. I'll install Qubes OS. For those who are still asking "WHAT THE FUCK FOR??!", I have an answer.

For years I lived with a thought that in our world, it's impossible to make any iformation really secure. I used to say "there is no lock that can't be picked". Always it's just a matter of time and effort.

Some days ago I thought I've lost my phone. With all passwords stored in my browser, and most of my logins saved in cookies. To evade long list, I can just say that almost ALL my accounts would be compromised. So I've spent a day changing my passwords, encrypting portable devices I've had left.

And when I finaly found my phone and encrypted all I could without much of an effort, still I felt some new thought and ideas sitting inside my head. Like "Why those governments are spying on us so easily, while we can make their life so much harder by a little bit of work on our side?" But most importantly, the question "Is it possible to at least have a chance of being secure in this world?"

So, the answer I got was "depends on how secure you wanna be, what exactly you want to do with your system and what do you expect to happen."

My problem is mostly with nosy people. And I wanna make my security holes so tiny, that they would have to sniff **THAT HARD** in order to get anything.

Again, I belive that it's impossible to be absolutely safe. I just want governments to do some Proof of Work, not Proof of Stake... for a change =D

post.title: A Dream.
post.body:
I've seen a dream, that I would like to remember, and not shy enough to not share. So the blog will do.

I've woken up somewhere in a wooden house, probaby in the country. My friend is there. Also 2 other people - friends of my friend. One I've seen before, another - not.

I'm awaken by my friend. She told me something, told me who has arrived while was asleep? I welcomed her with a smile, since we don't usually touch each other. A friend of her that I know I welcomed in my dream with "Yea, I saw you there...", and thinking "..wish I have not." And she went into the background, almost disappearing in it. Person I liked, then was nothing but an imprint on the background of my story. Would she return? To what end?

There is another one to great. I see her, in a second (as usually) I size her up. Not my type.. Who is?.. In 5 seconds (as usually) I know just how much of her is needed in my life. But this time I'm tired. Too tired to play any strategy. So I just tell her that in the morning the only thing I miss is a hug. No hints, no secrecy. Plain-text, no encoding, for all around to read.

Compatibility test is passed - she hugs me and kisses me in the cheek. I hug her, but kiss her in the neck and the nose. She is startled, but don't blush. The reaction I needed most.

_I had to make a pause, and details of the dream are fading  away. I turn the music on. Louder. Making sort of a locator out of it. Music distrupts my attention from the road and people, but being too loud it does not attract me. So I burrow deeper into my mind, in a search for a lost dream._

The following week, I get from my job earlier in an attempt to meet her more often. That angers my boss (mom). She makes it harder and harder for me to go early. Now I have a real reason to call her a "bossy bitch".

One day I am unable to finish my work in time  and go to meet the girl anyway. Mother is angry, but I make it a point that there is no way she can stop me. Not only I'm stubborn, I also don't like to deal with other stubborn people. When a conflict is inavoidable, I'd rather let her detonate, than keep trying to please her. In the end, I'd rather be with a wife, than with a mother.

The last glance, the last touch, the last talk. I enjoy every second. I won't be remembering the words when I wake up, but I will remember the warmth and comfort I felt. I won't remember what she looked like, but I will remember what I felt when I was looking at her. So well that I will be able to reconstruct her face. That is the reason I touch her lips, that is the reason I smell her hair, that is the reason I hold her hand.

Mother will find a way to stop me. She will wake me up. "Get up! We are in a hurry!" She won't know why I will welcome her with anger. She won't care. Good. There will be a rainy day.

Good morning, ZeroNet. Musickiller is on the line.

post.title: Lost and Found
post.body:
Today I thought I've lost my phone. Realisation that someone might get access to my email (means "all my accounts without double authorisation"), and my browser (all open accounts and some saved passwords) made me feel uneasy.

Today was a day when I thought "hey! Any half-lame hacker can read my key files only because they are stored on 4 unencrypted devices, on 3 different platforms!" So I've encrypted my tablet and made plans of encrypting my notebook and (may be) computer. PC's HD is ticking like a bomb already, so quite soon no one will be  able to read that data =D

So imagine how have I felt when exactly today I could not find my phone. Ofcourse I've revoked all authrisation that I could and changed some passwords, and then found the phone... But the feeling I still remember.

So as soon as I found it, I've locked it with a password. Can't encrypt it, but password will be enough, since there are no key-files there.

So today... ugh... Yesterday I've stepped into the world where the source I can trust most is my own head. I've also discovered that I remember almost all passwords that I make. Cool. All I had to do was to make it a high priority information and my head has stored it safe.

But some things are unclear to me. And if you are still reading it, I would appreciate some comments. How does encryption help, if as soon as I decrypt the drive, anyone from outside can read the data just as easy as he would have if the data was unencrypted? Or drive encryption actually helps even when one person has decoded it? And if it is so on linux, is it the same way on android or linux? You can just send places where I can read about it myself, if you don't want to write about it yourself...

Good night, people of ZeroNet. Don't loose your phones. And your heads too.

post.title: Mass Storage Project
post.body:
Again I fund inspiration while talking to KS... This time I have just thought that keybase is too dependant on trust, since it's server-based...

Read. Tell me where I'm wrong. Or why have no one done it yet?!

---

---

#Introdiction
I think that the best storage project would be a distributed web of people that gain credits for storing files of other people and use them for storing their own files.

_I have to check all of this a couple of times, and I'll refine my thoughts in some time. Please don't judge too harsh now. But still I do need critics._

#Old Stuff
_I'll rewrite it later. Sorry to leave it this way((_

~~You give 4 GB of space to store someone's data for 30 days and get 120 credits. If you cancel the deal, you loose all 120 credits. You have to be active for at least 3-6 hours every day or you'll loose credits.~~

_this parts looked most stupid, so I've wrote about money and credits in the end of this post. But I have to save this stuff too, since if I delete it, I might forget some parts of this concept_

~~You can give 120 credits to store 1 GB of data for 30 days on 4 computers on the network, or 512 MB on 8 computers (depending on how much redundancy do you need).~~

And ofcourse it would have all those PGP and sharing from keybase, blah-blah-blah...

There should be a blockchain for the currency (and may be PC names? Yea. don't trust IP!)...

is that so hard to do? Why do people still use servers to store data???

~~And see how cool it is: you just give 40 GB for a day, download the data, check it, get your 40 credits store 200 MB of documents for 20 days on 10 computers and the next day you can delete that 40 GB of trash and live freely, knowing that your info is secure!~~

However, it's gonna be a very slow system. You'll need to wait while people will upload their data into your PC, then wait for HOURS while your stored data is offline (even 10 PCs won't be online 24/7, what if you stored your data on 3 PCs?).

And also who said that you'll have all your 40 GB filled at once? Most probably that means that the credit system should be reworked, or smth... But anyway, the idea is good, I know it!

#NEW Stuff!
#Money and Credits

_I have been thinking more about this topic and have fixed price is not a good idea. Look how I think it might actually work:_

## Data Lenders
Let's imagine that the system is running already for some time (5-10 months) and there are already enough people in it. When somebody new comes to the system, he gets an account (in the blockchain), and he buys some credits from people that want money for their work. On some board (NXT-like or non-blockchain-at-all) he sets maximum price and how many computers he wants his data to be stored on all the time. As soon as he finds enough Offers, his data is uploaded and stored. I'm not yet shure when exactly credits should be transfered, but let's go further.

##Data Holders
This time let's imagine someone that has space on his drives, and wants to earn some money from it (why keep your TB drives empty, when they can bring at least some money?) The guy goes into the network, sets up an account and sets how much space he can offer, for how long, how often he will be online (maximum) every day (evey week?), and how much miminal price for his services is. When a client finds him (automagicly), data is transfered into his drives. Every day he has to be online for a quota his client has set up. I suppose, that this should be checked by Forgers(?). An analogy with NXT, but here this guys will also check who's online, make searchable tables for Clients and some other dirty work. I suppose that if a Forger will have to send a thousand pings and a new block would be made every 10 minutes, and Data Holders would only need to answer to 1 ping every hour, the system will work well.

_I have only wanted to write about monetary system here, but I'm being carried away somewhere, where I've not been thinking about yet. Gotta go to bed, it's 3:30 here already =(_

Sorry, no time to write. look at MaidSafe.

post.title: Shadow of the Hegemon
post.body:
"Let me tell you something, Julian Delphiki. You didn't have a mother and father, so you need to be told. You know what I dread most? That Peter will pursue these ambitions of his so relentlessly that he'll never have a life."

"Conquering the world isn't a life?" asked Bean.

"Alexander the Great," said Mrs. Wiggin. "He haunts my nightmares for Peter. All his conquests, his victories, his grand achievements-they were the acts of an adolescent boy. By the time he got around to marrying, to having a child, it was too late. He died in the midst of it. And he probably wouldn't have done a very good job of it either. He was already too powerful before he even tried to find love. That's what I fear for Peter."

"Love? That's what this all comes down to?"

"No, not just love. I'm talking about the cycle of life. I'm talking about finding some alien creature and deciding to marry her and stay with her forever, no matter whether you even like each other or not a few years down the road. And why will you do this? So you can make babies together, and try to keep them alive and teach them what they need to know so that someday they'll have babies, and keep the whole thing going. And you'll never draw a secure breath until you have grandchildren, a double handful of them, because then you know that your line won't die out, your influence will continue. Selfish, isn't it? Only it's not selfish, it's what life is for. It's the only thing that brings happiness, ever, to anyone. All the other things-victories, achievements, honors, causes-they bring only momentary flashes of pleasure. But binding yourself to another person and to the children you make together, that's life. And you can't do it if your life is centered on your ambitions. You'll never be happy. It will never be enough, even if you rule the world."

"Are you telling me? Or telling Peter?" asked Bean.

"I'm telling you what I truly want for Peter," said Mrs. Wiggin. "But if you're a tenth as smart as you think you are, you'll get that for yourself. Or you'll never have real joy in this life."

"Excuse me if I'm missing something here," said Bean, "but as far as I can tell, marrying and having children has brought you nothing but grief You've lost Ender, you've lost Valentine, and you spent your life pissed off at Peter or fretting about him."

"Yes," she said. "Now you're getting it."

"Where's the joy? That's what I'm not getting."

"The grief is the joy," said Mrs. Wiggin. "I have someone to grieve for. Whom do you have?"

Such was the intensity of their conversation that Bean had no barrier in place to block what she said. It stirred something inside him. All the memories of people that he'd loved--despite the fact that he refused to love anyone. Poke. Nikolai. Sister Carlotta. Ender. His parents, when he finally met them. "I have someone to grieve for," said Bean.

"You think you do," said Mrs. Wiggin. "Everyone thinks they do, until they take a child into their heart. Only then do you know what it is to be a hostage to love. To have someone else's life matter more than your own."

"Maybe I know more than you think," said Bean.

"Maybe you know nothing at all," said Mrs. Wiggin.

They faced each other across the table, a loud silence between them. Bean wasn't even sure they'd been quarreling. Despite the heat of their exchange, he couldn't help but feel that he'd just been given a strong dose of the faith that she and her husband shared with each other.

Or maybe it really was objective truth, and he simply couldn't grasp it because he wasn't married.

http://www.rulit.me/books/shadow-of-the-hegemon-read-69121-34.html

post.title: Down the deepest chasm lies my sorrow.
post.body:
I've hidden my emotions so deep that my hands stopped shaking. They were doing that for at least 5 years. I should be glad, but if I let myself be glad, I'll fall into some depressive mood before I even smile. Funny, huh?

Let's just see what tomorrow brings us, shall we? I bet that even a book that I'm about to continue listening to, will break my defenses. I've become too emotional through past few months. Even by my own standards.

However, I want to write about it before I forget it.

It has happened very fast. I remember seeing a word combination that promised bad news. My brain has only started to assemble the sentence, when my stomach had already decided to make me throw up. By the time I have read "I'm sorry if I made you feel bad" I was thinking only about running to a toilet before my nervous system makes me roll on the floor in a convulsion, throwing up my dinner.

But instead, in an eye blink, everything stopped. I was not even worried. I've opened a discussion, read the message that should have "make me feel bad", replied, talked more, and more, then closed it. With no feelings. Gone to a bath tub. Meditated for an hour. Nothing.

Only when I was writing to my sister, I had felt a rage of emotion deep under the calmness. But it was too easy to suppress. Like a bug that you stomp simply because it's less trouble dead than alive.

I think yesterday I will have to face it all. But thank God, today I can sleep.

post.title: "Cancel changes" button
post.body:
Don't you feel no need in a "cancel changes" button near "sign and publish" one?

The reason it is not there seem to be that you save all the changes when you press "save" button, and nobody thought that it is not a real change before it is signed.

What if I don't want to publish several changes I've made? What if I've pressed "save" only to leave editing mode? Currently, I have to go to a side panel and press "update" button, to receive an older version of my files from my peers. But it's not very comfortable. A small "Delete changes" button (that would do exactly the same thing) near "Sing and publish" button would be much better.

What do you think?)))

P.S. I've decided that it's more important to post stuff from my head, than check it for mistakes and typos. So I've made several unchecked posts. Not sorry about that, because when it comes to writing down stuff from my head, it's better to be in a hurry writing it, before a thought expires and goes away...

post.title: HTML as an alternative to .doc and .rtf
post.body: I was thinking... What if I write something in a .txt file and want to underline or cross some text? Or make it bold or italic? But I don't want to use office shit, and I want the file to be able to view the file on ANY PC with no need to install stuff or to wait minutes till my old notebook loads some Office 15 or smth like that. I can use HTML tags! Just like that. A plain text, but I write `bold text` and get bold text. Easy! Then I just rename it to .html instead of .txt and view it in any browser I want. Want to edit? Just press "edit" in context menu or open it in any editor I want! But it's not enough. My brain wanted to go further. So let's think of it: I can do in html most stuff I can do in Word or Writer! Images, fonts, several columns/rows of text on tbe page - anything! #Why is it cool? - edit in any text editor - no need to wait until your Word loads to view a footnote - complexity depends on your demands - you can just have a simple text file with some underlined/italic text, or you can make a nice page with fonts, paragraphs, proper tags (``) - language is simple and useful. Long live HTML! - multimedia. Can you add music and video in any office pack so that it could be opened on ANY device worldwide? In HTML 5 you can! With a simple tag. #Questions: What to do with formulas? Most office packs now provide a writer with formula support. I don't know any substitution here. Any help? What other stuff you usually need in Word that you can't do in HTML? # Comments summary @ks: it's hard to read raw files! @mk: no.

Sometimes I stare at photos/profile pics of ppl for a long time while talking to them in my head. Helps when there is not enough chat with someone.

Sometimes I just look. With no thoughts. It's when I miss someone. 

Good night, stranger.

post.title: Summary of last weeks and future plans
post.body:
Caution, my lovely grammar-nazi, I don't use spell-checker now and my grammar suck just as much as my cautiousness ( < here lies the first word I've checked) about typos.

Since my PC is still off and the only thing my notebook does is downloading/sharing some porn and kids' cartoons, I don't have any computer-like topic to write about. I wanted to write "sorry" here, but guys, seriously? For once in this year I have something to do besides sitting before a computer screen! I'm not sorry about it for damn sure! Sometimes I think, that programming is something I do when my friends say "There is too much of you in my life". **But**(!) I'll try to summ up here everything I can.

#PC World
##ZeroNet

- I am still here
- (On touch-screens) Now it's impossible to switch to ZeroHello with a Zero button in the corner, but possible to drag it and open a menu. OK.
- tablet rules, because I have ZeroNet whenever I want it. Awesome. Double-avesome when I want to say "Hey! Do you know what ZeroNet is? Look at that!" And I don't have to show screenshots or describe how good it works, just show. I can even give the guy to check it on his own. I like that.
- Yes, with ZN my tablet lives not as long as usually.

##Time&Plans
- Don't have it
- Won't have it any time soon

##Stuff
- notebook serves me as a server. It has Sync, and ZeroNet, and qBitTorrent 24/7. Neat. And it's almost silent.

#Real World
##Cat
It's good to start with a cat, is it not?
- It's still fat...
- ...but became a little bit more angry. Now it's a little bit of skin on my palm that is missing and I think there will be a scar. Fluffy red fury...
- But it still respects me like I'm his elder brother, sometimes it's trying to fight me, sometimes he sleeps on my arms (I'm still the only one whos arms he likes to sleep on. Even just to lay on. it's awesome ^_^)
- When there was a salut on 9'th of May, he was scared and I hepled him by holding him. It's the first time an animal is **less** afraid of something when I hold it. All my dogs and cats usually tried to scratch their way away from my hands.

##Last Weekend
It was the most awesome time in my recent life. Friends, family, I love you all, you are great. Thank you. I want to write more, but I was asked not to do that in order to evade unnecessary ( < here is a second word I've checked) questons.

##My brain...
...is ok. I'm ready for new stuff again. And I can't wait to get some. =^_^=

##My Sisters
2 - We still don't talk. Nothing changed here. We just have nothing to talk about.
3 - We don't talk because she thinks I'm stupid. And for once in our history, I agree with that. I will try to change it when I have some time.
5 - We don't meet and this time I think I know why. Great.

All - still are among the most important people in my life. I don't think it will change it next 4 years.

##My Emotions
Don't ask. I was building a wall that protected me from horrors of this world and horrors of this world from me. Weekend's hide-and-seek with my Bro made this wall break. I feel everything. May be I like it. I'm not sure. I've missed this feeling - oh yes. But it is going to ruin me if not handled with care. Gonna play around more. Block it again if can't handle it.

As usually the only thing I'm sure - I'm not scared, if there is something coming, I'll jump right in the middle of it and do my best.

##My Fears
???????

A week ago I thought I've conquered the last of them. Now when my emotions are free, I have to check those cages in the back.

##My plans
- Work. All free time. I need money. Never ever said that before, by the way.
- Learn? I still have something to do at the university. I'm not sure if that is called "learn" or "study", or there is any other word but "waste my time", but I need to finish it. My duty. I feel that I will need that in the future. Means I will try to do my best here too. Or at least not to drop out of it.
- Spend time with friends and family. "How, if I spen all free time for work?" you ask? Easy. I use "free" time for work. Not "Friends and Family" time =) I plan to spend more time on them actually. Since I will have money to do that.

#Something to end this post
There is much I wanted to write, but I don't have time and I think it's for the best. Writing too much is a bad habbit I was trying to kill.

post.title: A Line
post.body:
OK.
I grow up.
You win.

post.title: I'm Back!
post.body:
This odd feeling.. I don't have **time** to degrade! Steam, say bye-bye to my money, if you have not done it already! Bay12Games, I'll pay sooner or later, belive me. Let my beard be clean-shaved if I lie!

My brain is blown. So... **SO** much information! So many thoughts to recompile. I start to understand so many people... So **MANY**... <font color="white" face="Arial" size="4"> Sleep helped to stop tears for some time. But I feel them coming back. Some hours before that happens, I have. Gonna try to do something useful. Then sleep again. My brain needs some more time to work... To pack all those thoughts and emothions to memory, before anything bad happens.

I thank all people I have ever met before for making me strong. Tomorrow I will be OK. My brain can deal with it. Yes. It's just a good workout after some lazy times. Nothing I can't handle. But I will be running today. Like a hell-hound. Like a fucking hell hound.

What has happened you ask? Don't. But I think that I can answer why my sister does not meet with me now. Damn, it looks simple now! The question of years seems simple. I have to try to solve it.

To the one who might think that has fucked my brain - no, it's ok. I'm always like that when deal with a big amount of new stuff. Some time and I will be ok. Better than ok. Better than I was.
</font>

Good bye now. Let all the luck there is, turn back to your foes. Ever.

P.S. Sorry for typos and mistakes, I have tried to clean them, but no time to run spell-checker now.

post.title: BANG!
post.body:
I've just finished watching the last movie that I have not watched fully but wanted to. I feel a little bit more complete and in peace with my past.

It's a big moment for me, even though it sounds stupid. I have not even known names of some of those movies and it is a miracle I've found them!

It has started with "Spirits Within" being recorded on last minutes of a video tape with my cartoons, and every time I've watched them, I also wanted to watch the movie of which I saw only first 5 minutes. Thanks to television I was able to find the name of the movie and watch about 2 years ago. (it may be the only time I say "thanks" to television, so it's also a small big moment here)))

There was also that other cartoon, which name I've forgotten, I've seen only 15 minutes of it (had to go to music school then. One of reasons I hated it was that unwatched cartoon.) and wanted very much to see all of it. Found it this year. When I saw the name on torrent list (probably was searching for porn though, but it's not a big probability, since the movie is about space and future) I felt an **urge** to watch it even though there was a lot of different tasty names around. I've felt that I have to. And I did.

There were some others and today it was Men in Black 3. I've watched last 30 minutes of it on the TV and wanted to see all of it. Today my Godfather shown me first 10 minutes, I've remembered about it and watched it (finished several minutes ago).

So now there is a big part of my history that is finished. Complete. Done. I can move on. A small but important relief.

post.title: Hm...
post.body:
Yes. The only way for me to study programming languages is to attempt to write mini games. I never succeed, but it seems to be one of few motivators that make me learn.

Not only it's good as a motivation. Also, I discover stuff on my own and then read it in the book. Or sometimes I feel that I can't finish some block of code without some particular knowledge, then I go and read it. It works even for basic stuff, no need to go far.

Modules. I was too lazy to read stuff about it. I've just learned how to `import` them and made a train of small files one call another one (I just like to work in separate windows at the same time. Somehow it's easier to understand stuff when it's not only split into blocks of code by comments, but also by windows and sometimes - PC screens).

But then I've encountered a problem: I could not pass a variable from one module to other. Using my laziness I've invented several ways to evade reading the book, all of which had led me to a conclusion: "I need to read the manual!"

It was like standing before a wall with horns of my stubbornness pressing against it (with no result of course) and at last being tired from the process with nothing left but to look on the wall and see the writing saying "READ THE DAMN MANUAL!"

Or "Speak 'Friend' and come in"... Whichever is easier to imagine for you =)


P.S. My friend and I are arguing, is it right to say "before the wall", or should I use "in front of" instead??

Now I don't need to press "Quit" and then start the app again! If I made some change in a code, I can simply press "Restart" and the app will recompile itself and start itself again xD AWESOME! My dream since I've started programming was to write an app that could be edited from within that app, and with Python it's easy-peasy x))) Actually it was 5-10 years ago and now I understand that it's better to use external text editor for editing. So ability to `reload(a_module)` is an awesome feature provided by Python =^_^= # A thing to change... ... is to add the ability to call "restart" from any module. I've tried `this` and `self`, but none of them recognise current module =( If any of you know how to reference a current module, please tell me =)

post.title: Dwarf Fortress story
post.body:
I have decided that it will be more fun to write down what happens in my fort this time. Since it's the first time I do that, the log is going to be  boring. But I will still post it here. Comment on how do you think I can make it better.

So what is it: it is a story based on my progress in Dwarf Fortress. I will write from the perspective of one of Dwarfs I will be playing from the beginning. And some other Dwarf if the one on behalf of whom I speak will die. I will use "thoughts" of a dwarf to spot out things that he likes/dislikes/wants and announcements, fort statistics and my own observations to make things at least a bit more interesting (since almost all dwarf thinks of is work, drinks, weather and how comfortable the bed was (sounds familiar?)))) Also I will add a (very) little stuff from myself to make stuff sound more logical and nice.

Here it is:

It was 15 of Granite in the year 250, when our new fortress, Tabarustuth, was started. It began as an idea to expand the territory of our nation, "The Rack of Kindling". Not a distant outpost, we were building very close to another Dwarven town (which name I have forgotten now). But because it's local forces were limited and required to fend off constant attacks of goblins, we had to rely on our own skills. May Ral Mineumber be with us and the peace throughout the world!

Ah yes, I am Urdim Zegdomas... or "Tattooedguild" on the Common-talk. I am chief medical dwarf (work as a carpenter). I am sixty-five years old. Just the right age for adventures!

17.01.250 Tropics. Jungle. Not the best climate, our continent can provide, but far from being called the worst. However constant rains are trouble. I hope that miners will give us the comfort of the limestone rock soon.

20.01.250 Litast Tunilul ("Doorlords"), our hunter, was using copper bolts, which is against rules, but he is a lover of our Expedition Leader, so I he definitely can do that...

04.02.250 Mason's and carpenter's workshops are setup (some work at last!) and the main hall is carved out. More like a hole for now, but no time for lucsuries - we have to set up basic production chains as soon as possible. And when ale, wine and beer rivers run, we can do all the smoothing and engraving we want...

01.03.250 A butchery and a dorminatory are complete. And work is going. And there is beer. Oh yes.. Beer is good. But I am constantly annoyed by rain and flies. Maybe it's good that my workshop is indoors!

01.07.250 Autumn has come. So much has been done, but even more is to be done. Damn, we still don't produce alcohol! Imagine what can happen if we run out! And the winter is closing in!

Also we had some kea problem. Damn creatures have stolen both our axes, quivers, backpacks... Almost everything that we brought from our homelands! Not that I'm feeling sad.. Everything is pretty awesome... We have started to produce crafts yesterday. Shells. Too much refuse from all those turtles we ate.

Also our miners have dig up some space for farms! Great news. More mushrooms - more alcohol! All that's left is to bring some mud with water!..

.07.250 Traders came. Asking for shields, cut gems and figurines. Shields... I hope, no wars are coming.. We bought some good beer from them. Not enough for the whole winter, I'm afraid.

2.10.250 We have a problem. We have a big problem. I told them to finish farm preparation faster! I've told them! No one listened! Now it's winter and we have a VERY limited supply of drinks! And also we have that animal problem too... No water for them at all. Bad. We already have a yak and a horse dead..

If you live on a different continent, you might think that "tropics" means that we won't have any snow here, but anyone from our lands know how diverse is weather here. It's hot in summer and chilly in winter...

26.10.250 A Moonstone. It's going to be a busy month. First - problems with water, now - Mistem Uzlirvabok has begun an artifact... Let's see what will happen next...

03.11.250 Ilidlemis, "Ruledvine", a schist floodgate with an image of a forgotten beast. Marvelous construction. And useful! But I hear, our EL wants to install it in a statue garden. Not bad.

26.12.250 Vutok Seloredem, our second Hunter (one of first immigrants) has been found dead. Hunter is a dangerous profession... We found his mangled corpse today. It seems that he run out of ammo. Our craftsdwarf was doing his best, but it was too much of work for a single person... People are going to be devastated. Miners have started to carve out first burial level... So it begins.

A SUMMARY OF THE FIRST YEAR
1 dead, 0 missing, 2 animals dead. Halls are carved several levels under the ground. But we spent so much time carving them, that we did not even started building befroms and specialised production rooms, so all dwarfs sleep in the first enterance hall, and in a room nearby all the production is going.

About products we make - all very basic production chains are set up. (Not much of chains, we only work with stone, bone, shell and wood which now.) So we are waiting for Elven and Human caravans to show up. Human specially, since we have lots of wood after that planning problem. And when I say lots, I mean that we have enough for several years of wood-only production. I hope Elves won't mind that...

01.01.251 Snow is melting, the word is that <s>hippys'</s> Elven caravan is coming soon. Gems are sent to the depot.

post.title: Meow. Studying Python.
post.body:
##My First App:
fib.py
```
# This app creates the Fibonacci series.
#
# Usage: fib <nunber>, where <number> defines how many numbers to create'
#
import sys
a, b = 0, 1
if len(sys.argv) == 2:
    i = int(sys.argv[1])
    #i = 5
    if i <= 0:
        print 'Please choose a number from 1 to 50'
    elif i > 0:
        if i <= 50:
            while i != 0:
                print b
                a, b = b, a+b
                i = i - 1

        elif i > 50:
            print ('Please choose a number from 1 to 50')
    else:
        print 'ERROR: Wrong input!'
else:
    print 'ERROR: Wrong input! Please choose a number!'
```

Yea, I know, there should be an initial check if an argument is a number, but it would take me extra time to do that and I have to go to bed ASAP.

post.title: Mars Simulation Project (mars-sim)
post.body:
Some time ago I was searching for interesting space themed simulators. Several things proved to be interesting. One game (Take On Mars) and one simulation app (mars-sim). I won't write about the game here, if you are interested, check out steam and you can find the latest build on btdigg.org or thepiratebay.org.

## Link
https://sourceforge.net/projects/mars-sim/
(however guys were talking about moving to GitHub)

## About
// I'm not going to write detailed "about the project" here, because you can read it at sourceforge. I'm only going to point out things that make this project different from others I saw.

The task that people behind mars-sim given to themselves was to develop an app (not a game) for simulating "what would happen to first colonists on Mars". Not only guys want to simulate everyday duties of every colonists, but also they try to simulate what happens in their brains! And most interesting part of the task they have is to make this simulator so good, that even NASA would use it.

## Help

If you know Java and have some free time you want to spend on something that would possibly help mankind, join those guys! Maybe in some years they will make something really great!)

## My Notes
If you want to check out the latest version (.8), you will have to use Oracle Java, not OpenJDK.

post.title: New Record
post.body:
Yesterday I have endured 2.5 hours of running with a single 5 minute stop (nose problems again...)

My last record was 2 hours. This time I had too much to think about, so extra 30 minutes I spent meditating.

Very productive by the way. I've discovered that I can run just as good without any stimulators like music or perverted pictures. I've understood why do I run: it appears that I'm not trying to run away from anything, and instead, my runs are manifestation of my idea of searching, and of the pursuit of my dreams. And I have solved a dilemma I had with my sister (4-th cousin, if I'm writing it right).

The reason I've decided to go running was that I've found old messages from my sister. And there was a question whether I should break my promises to myself, fall on the floor, cry, and fuck my sisters brains for a couple of hours, or to find another way to deal with my emotions and thoughts.

For 2 hours of running my brain was denying to think about anything. But after that I felt an urge to take my headphones off. When I've done it, of thousands thoughts in my head, I saw only those I was interested in. They hit me like an electrical shock when I spoke them and all the pain and tiredness of my body faded as I did so. And when I had an answer about that message problem, I've decided to make another circle without music and go home. On that circle I've answered some questions about myself that were bothering me.

So instead of spending the extra energy I had in me, I've found even more.

Good thing was that I have decided to run home after that last circle. When I switched to walk from run, I've felt, that I could barely stand. I've felt as if all my body was empty. But my mind was sharp and I did not collapse even when everything got blurry and dark.

Surprisingly, no pain in my muscles today. Seems that 1-4 hours in the bathroom really does help.

P.S. Yes, Erkan, you were right, I do tonns of mistakes. https://www.languagetool.org/ does help.

post.title: Nasal Bleeding
post.body:
##Good because:
- I can't die from too much pressure in my head. My nose will just dump blood until the pressure is normal

##Bad because:
- VERY uncomfortable:
Every summer and winter I have regular nasal bleedings, because the air is too dry or too hot.
- Dirty:
If it starts suddenly, everything is covered in blood. And one should never sneeze if his nose is filled in blood. <font color="#AA0000">**NEVER**</font>
- Just imagine it happen in public
- In theory, every time my blood pressure rise, I can get a bleeding (see japan comics and cartoons, when a boy sees a nice girl and get a nasal bleeding). Good news, it's sort of a lie. If the weather is fine (air pressure, air wetness, temperature), a perverted thought won't make my nose bleed. More on that topic: why would it? The blood is diverted to the lower part of the body!

*If you are a medic and have something to comment here, comment. I'm not a medic, so stuff you read here is based only on my observations. 22 years of them, but I still can make mistakes sometimes =)

post.title: Updatable torrents
post.body:
ZeroNet is live for quite some time now and still no one built a torrent client based on this technology? Where are smart guys and what they are doing???

It's possible to build a file sharing app by simply allowing ZN to wait longer for file transfer to be over, but if someone would be able to berge it with bittorrent stuff, it would be much better. Actually, what I was thinking was merging torrent with ZN, with dominance of torrent. There is no need in all those web services and stuff for simple file sharing app.

Yes, persistent torrents are more secure, but I'm a bit tired of constantly downloading new versions of games and apps. With ZN-like technology, it would be possible to update clients' files. And client would be able to pin versions he likes (because new versions are more buggy sometimes and may lack of some functions).

I suppose a smart move would be just to add it as a plugin to ZN and solve 2 problems: implement updatable torrents and ZN's large file transfer. But there should be a separate interface to control large files. Storing everything like ZN is doing now is not an option!

post.title: IPFS.PICS Client
post.body:
I've got an idea of photo synchronization/sharing/storing app. It would use ipfs.pics to upload photos and any gateway to get them.

Why not IPFS directly? Because it does not always work =( For example, for some unknown reason, my IFPS on notebook does not work without my PC IPFS on.

But it would be even better if there was an option to use IPFS itself.

By the way, I think it should not be hard. Just a small client that is run after IPFS is run, what it does is adding and pinning photos, saving data somewhere.. Giving a shareable link to the photo via gateway.

IPFS.PICS uploader sounds a bit harder: there should be a way to check if their servers are not over their capacity.

post.title: Run. Die. Repeat.
post.body:
Something I hate about my body - as soon as I stop, I can feel more energy pumping to my legs. Sucks so much. I hoped to become tired, but instead, my legs ache, my spine ache, my head ache, my everything ache, but after some time in bed, I'm ready to run again -_-

An hour of running, 15-30 minutes of walking and more than 30 minutes of preparations are **wasted**. As soon as I stopped and took my clothes off, the look of my red and wet body was enough to make my legs shake with energy again! I wish I had orgasms like that. (recals last 2 days) No, I take that one back...

Uhhh... I love spring. Really. So many smells. So warm. No more ice. No more cold. But every spring there is a feeling of several Energizers up in my ass. Successively connected, to get more voltage. Why can't I skip this one at least sometimes?

Bad news all around. Tomorrow's plans seem to be canceled. I have tonns of energy and no where to apply it. That's how revolutions are started. I already have a pirate flag on my desktop ^_^

post.title: Free Torrent Client
post.body:
I'm in search of a new torrent client.

**qBittorrent** can't handle torrents with large amount of files.

**Deluge** is nice but it's functionality is... I don't know what word would be right here, small or weak or smth... It sucks.

**FrostWire** I am trying now, but it's not free. It's open-source. Coz officialy people can't use it to violate laws.  Good news I'm a pirate. I can.
**Result:** It suck. All I want to say before I forget about it's existance. Would it have console interface, it would be more user friendly. Such an ugly GUI... Make me unsee it... Make me unuse it...

**Transmission...** No, I'm not kidding. It deals awesome with lots-of-files torrents! Instantly does stuff that makes qBittorrent die. Problems: it can't run in the background and it's interface could be better. But it's fine.


And my decision is to use qBT as usually, but use Transmission where qBT can't work.

This idea came to me after that –î.–£.–ù.–Ø. (Dunya) thing. If @ks or @erkan are not too busy, they may send the link. The joke is old and not funny in Russia, however it's based on Russian language, so surely it was not translated.

post.title: Drugged.
post.body:
Last edit: 01.04.16 12:24

Never never drink coffee in the morning without practice. U know this awesome gentle but hot rush when you are drugged by some coffeine? No that's not what has happened to me. My whole body aches and shakes. I want to run, but have no will or power to move. Have real trouble typing, partly because my fingers shake like 10 small vibrators (will try the trick when I have a wife), and my eyes try to catch every movement (keyboard updates, blinking update sign, cursor movement and those horrible constantly changing their position fingers!).

I can't stand - my vision turnes dark and can't lay - my heart beats a battle march. My holes in my tees also ache wich means sugar kicked 'em hard and that's very bad news.

And I see 3 stages here:
1. I have enjoyed the coffee.
2. Everything described in this post.
3. My back started to move like I'm a catched snake. Partly controllable, I can stop it, but I have to concentrate on it. And when my attention jumts to every movement I see and every sound I hear, it's hard to concentrate on something in particular.

To @ks and @erkan: please don't say you feel sorry for me or anything, I didn't write it here coz I'm whining or asking for support, it's an interesting biological reaction and I just wanted to note it for later reference. =)

My be if I ever show this blog to my sister, she'll find it interesting too. (ok, if she finds it on her own. I doubt I'll do that myself, it would be like "please look as deep as you can into my perverted mind full of tonns of stupid and impossible ideas, I'm not sure for what, but just look")

EDIT: to @ks and @erkan: sorry, I meant "anything like 'sorry'". U can say anything else ofcourse xD I do respect your oppinion. It was hard to think and type then. correcting the mistake now =)

post.title: Versions' big big big problem
post.body:
♯ZeroNet; ♯bugs;

I have a problem. And you too by the way. When using several devices with ZeroNet, it's easy to loose changes due to some lag in synching.

Explaining: I 've wrote a post on my PC and it was online. And then in the morning I turned my tablet on, wrote a new post and now I see that my old post is not here.

Why? I had unpublished changes stored here (on the tablet) and so tablet would not update the blog before I published them here. So if I save some post and leave it here for later edit (or just forget to publish, or just be offline), and then make changes on PC, they all will be wasted after publishing on the tablet. Sucks.

Am I doing something wrong or do we have a bug here? Help me out here..

post.title: Protecting the opressed
post.body:
##To those who said that IPFS is slow:
Browse through this blog. All the pages. Do you see pictures? Did you see them instantly? Cool. All of them are on IPFS. Suck it.

Want them to stay here? Use IPFS.

Why else? Check the size of this blog. Check how much content do I have here. Check the size of the blog again and think of words like "netbook", "tablet", "smartphone". All of the content is awailable there while the blog itself is less than 1 MB. So by using differerent networks, I've enabled all the pictures and videos work easy and fast on any device without a lot of hard labor on my side and on yours.

Other ways to do that (with ZN) is to create a separate site with all the content, and have links to that content through ZN gateways. Bad news: not all ZN gateways store sites, so if that would work, it would work very slow. And it would still be dependant on how many ppl share that big box of content. That would suck, ok. IPFS is much better for sharing files **now** coz each file is downloaded as needed. It's harder to organize it in ZN **now**. Have ideas how to do that? Welcome to comments!

##The name of the post

Why does this post called "Protecting the opressed", is coz saying "IPFS" on ZN is like saying "gay" in Russia. Ppl start to sighing and looking somewhere alse if they are polite. **If** they are polite..

My aim is to form a discussion, it's not bad if you are not interested, it's bad if you think that everyone has the same oppinion as you or that someone in particular is more "right" that others. It's all like colored markers: each has it's own taste!)))

#READ COMMENTS,
there is some interesting stuff there!

post.title: YEEEAAAAHOOOOOOOO!!!
Auth Idea 2
post.body:
[Previous post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.musickiller.bit/?Post:44:Authorization+idea)

##Idea upgrade:
So... We have NMC and ZeroNet, right? ZeroNet has plugins, NMC has names. Why do we need NXT if we have NMC already? Can someone create a plugin that will work with NMC's API, checking for the name and giving an answer to the site. This way ZeroID will become a local plugin and there won't be any reppeating names!

Good news is that this thing should be checked only once in a while, so a "key" for the site can be used on devices that don't have NMC client installed!

Actually I have 2 reasons to propose this:
- Unlike NXT, NMC is used already
- As far as I undertand, when names expire they get deleted from the blockchain => less weight of the chain itself. (I can be wrong here. And if I'm wrong, there is a reason to use NXT =D)

post.title: NTX: My Oppinion
post.body:
## What I liked:

- Interface: It's beautiful, and quite easy to get around. There is a lot of new stuff for a Bitcoin user, but there are tutorials about everything, and you can always ask someone if something is not described.
- It's not a clone of BTC: means it has almost no problems of Bitcoin. Besides the size and download speen of the blockchain. So it's adequate to make a backup of it on some external drive, so that next time yoh don't have to wait several days to start using the system.
- It's not only about money. Ok, it is, but I mean that you can do stuff that no common BTC clone has. Lot's of stuff, so I won't count it all here.
- It's fast: faster than LTC, wich is much faster than BTC. Wich is very nice when you have several accounts or want to send a mesage through the network.

## What I disliked:

- It's not a clone of BTC: wich means it may contain bugs and vulnurabilities beyond BTC's. Comunity is on guard, but still it is something to take into consideration.
- It's fast. And I'm afraid that it means that the blockchain is growing fast to.

post.title: A bug with comments limit
post.body:
So after all it did not work. =( I think it may be caused by some bug. Ok, here is the full story:

I've reached the 10k limit several times, and several times I tried doferent ways to extend it. Every time I changed content.json inside site's users folder.

First time I tried to sign it with zeronet siteSign. Failed. Visual counter updated, limit was not extended.

Second time I tried to sign it with the buttom in the side pannel. Failed. Then nofish told me that I've just done it wrong: should have designated what content.json have I wanted to sign.

Third time (why do I call that a bug) I did it all right, signed with a side pannel, designated a right way before signing. PC's ZeroNet updated it right. I could post comments up to 11 kb (did not want to write more trash), but now I write this post from tablet, because I've discovered that I can't write any comments from it. A limit here is still on 10k. I dunno what to do. Will report it on Talk yesterday.

Still going to bed now.

Good night everyone!

post.title: DO YOU WANNA LIVE FOREVER???!!!
post.body: It's 9,5k on my chatter-counter and it's time to try to add more. Actually I've done it already and all that's left is to sign a .json. So let's do that! *probably will just kill my blog again... ** AHA! I've remembered to backup it BEFORE I've killed it! That's some progress! # Results (or HowTo) To extend limits one have to go to %siteFolder%/data/users, open content.json, add perissions (in the end). And then sign it in the side panel, but don't just press "sign", change it to data/users/content.json! Alternatively, you can sign it with siteSign --inner_path data/users/content.json option. TA DA!!!!!!! I've made it man! I've made it!

post.title: Authorization idea
post.body: [–ü–æ —Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–∏](http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.musickiller.bit/?Post:45:%D0%98%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%8F+%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B8%D0%BD-%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8) [Next Post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.musickiller.bit/?Post:58:New+blog+post) ##Table of contents: ###My (not very good?) ideas - Registration - Authorization - Why to make it decentralized? - What I could not grasp ###People's suggestions (look there!) - NXT ##Let us begin? I was thinking, how to unificate current and future authenfication systems with the use of Namecoin and came to some conclusions. I'm not sure if namecoin will do, if it would, please tell me so! That's how I see a decentralized authenfication system: #How would it work ##Registration: A client creates an account inside a *coin system. But I'm not sure if it should be free. Namecoin is great because to maintain a name you have to pay a small summ. I think that should be true here, because this name has to be stored, and disc storage in decentralized system is not as cheap as it is on a common server. ##Authorization - A common site: client makes 0 coin transaction on an address, provided by site, and in the tranzaction, some secret key (or simply computer address?) is stored that a site gives to a client. Secret key is needed because several computers may require an authorization at the same time and the key would show which computer is a real one. When succeded, site authorizes client and remembers his computer (with a cookie?). There is a transaction fee, because someone has to process this authorization. But it is low enough that a client can use the service once or even several times (extra security = extra money) a day if needed. - A site with a monthly fee: client makes N coin transaction (defined by the site)... and everything else is just the same! # Why is that better - Unlike common authorization services, it's impossible to guess client's password. - It's a fully distributed authorization service. #My questions: - Can any existing coin system be used? - That means, can any system send 0.0 coin transaction? - And can this system send extra info (secret key) if needed. #Good answers: - But then again, is Proof-of-Stake [reliable](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proof-of-stake#Criticism)? - http://127.0.0.1:43110/kappasigma.bit/?Post:6:Authentication+with+NXT+tokens

post.title: ZeroNet on Android (easy way)
post.body: Status: Kind of ready HELP ME TO FINISH THIS! Before we start, - I call it an easy way, because the hard way is to find a Python 2.7 for android (or compile it???) and do it "the right way". And this way is wrong because [GNURoot](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gnuroot.debian) is about 500 MB. - It's only "easy" if you worked with terminal before. If you did not, don't even DARE writing comments here!!! - –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–º –∏ –±—Ä–∞—Ç—å—è–º –°–ª–æ–≤—è–Ω–∞–º (to RUSSIANS): —è —Ç–æ–∂–µ —Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π –∏ —Ç–æ–∂–µ –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞-—Ç–æ –Ω–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–ª –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–∏–π. –£—á–∏—Ç–µ. –ü—Ä–∏–≥–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è. –¢—É—Ç –º–∞–ª–æ —á—Ç–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞–¥–æ, –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥—á–∏–∫ —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø–∞—Ä—É —Å–ª–æ–≤ –Ω–µ –ø–æ–Ω—è—Ç–Ω–æ, —Å–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏—Ç–µ –≤ –∫–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ö –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ –ø–æ—á—Ç–µ. –ù—ã—Ç—å—ë —Ç–∏–ø–∞ "—è –∏–¥–∏–æ—Ç, –Ω–∏—á–µ–≥–æ –Ω–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—é", –∏–ª–∏ "–∞–≤—Ç–æ—Ä –∏–¥–∏–æ—Ç, –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º—É —á—Ç–æ —è –Ω–∏—á–µ–≥–æ –Ω–µ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞—é" - –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è. –ñ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –ø–æ–∫–∞ —è –∏–ª–∏ –∫—Ç–æ-—Ç–æ –µ—â—ë –ø–µ—Ä–µ–≤–µ–¥—ë—Ç –≤–∞–º. #1. Install [GNURoot Debian](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gnuroot.debian) (does not require root, creator thinks it's obvious from the name o_O) - After installation, launch, tap "install" and "patch" (not sure if patch is required, but it takes no time at all if not) - After that tap "Launch" #2. Follow steps from [ZeroNet setup page](http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/using_zeronet/installing/), or this, trashed refined by me 1. apt-get update 2. also a good idea to do apt-get upgrade 3. apt-get install msgpack-python python-gevent 4. here is a VERY good idea to go to /home folder by cd ~ 5. Next, you can either 5.1. wget https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/archive/master.tar.gz tar xvpfz master.tar.gz 5.2. Or instad of this, you can download this file in a browser and unpack it into /GNU*/home/ 6. cd ZeroNet-master 7. Just to doublecheck I tun python update.py 8. And start withpython zeronet.py #3. How to start in the future: - If terminal is trarted, tap on it in the drop-down menu - If not, open GNURoot Debian and tap Launch In the terminal run cd ~/Z* python zeronet.py HELP ME TO FINISH THIS! #4. Tips and Tricks - usually you can replace stuff like "zeronet.py" with "z*", but because there is "zeronet.pyc", I don't do that. Correct me if I'm stupid ^_^ - you can run previous commands with "volume button"+"w" even after reboot. Awesome. Linux rulez! - Debian need not your childish sudo! Just do it as a real SuperUser! - I could not create symbolic links on Android, so I did it like I wrote it here. (tar says "can't create symbolic links") - on startup (and after adding several new sites) wait for several minutes while all your sites get updated. Don't use zeronet, or it will be very laggy and sites will get "timeout" error. #5. Other uselessfull info - no it does not eat ALL the battery. On the phone (yes, I did that on the phone too!) it's not notisable, on the tablet... a bit. May be it's not coz of ZN. I had troubles like that before. - no it does not take all CPU or memory. Very kind to those ones actually - no it does not eat all your traffic. My 70 MB/day are MUCH more than enough for ZN + other browsing + apps. If you don't belive me, sync at home and work, and use it without network when on the move (don't, it's stupid) =) However, I only tested that with few sites on the phone, I still sync tablet at home. But I plan to test it with "full power" some day. Tested? comment here or write me on the mail so that I add more info! - yes, it's pretty cool, but don't share it with your stupid friends that ask "what for did you do this?" (I forgot what I wanted to write here, but this will do)))) - you CAN'T drag "0" button. Or I can't.. May be you'll find a way?? To post stuff you have to edit site's properties to "own": "true" in a text editor. - benchmarks showing how sucky python is on a droid (trust me it's not that bad xD) http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.musickiller.bit/?Post:40:New+blog+post - we need to make this guide better, help me! Also translate it to other languages. And to Russian too, they won't let me be in peace if someone won't do that...

It becomes a tradition to kill and to restore my blog from time to time.

This time I was trying to add "domain" into .json file. I did not turn ZeroNet off before publishing, something gone wrong, and I could not comment again. Any fixes I tried did not help. Before I never backed up my site, so officially it died again.

Then I remembered that several minutes (an hour?) ago I've turned wi-fi off on my tablet, wich meant that a copy there was still working!AHA! Using Sync I shared a copy to my notebook (new backup place) and my PC (fast way to share). Now it's back to life, but I'm gonna try adding "domain" again, so stay tuned, may be quite fun! =D

If anyone posted any comments in that hour, they should be lost. please reppeat!

post.title: Mornings
post.body: Do you know what I hate in the morning? Well.. Just imagine: You open your eyes and you are 7 minutes early and all you think is "oh, sure 7 minutes is enough for a good healthy sleep!" So you close your eyes and just as you do that, you are awoken by an alarm. You think "Now it feels much better! Now it is my second alarm and it's the perfect time to get up!" You look at the clock and "Oh fuck! It's my third alarm! I'm 30 minutes late! Then you blink, just to get that sleepyness out of your head, to water your eyes, and bam! It's your fourth alarm clock, and it's 1,5 hour too late! So today I have sit up in the bed, tired of being angry about something that happens almost every single day, took my phone to see what classes have I missed and what else won't harm to miss (the usual thing), saw that today is a bad day to miss anything (the unusual thing)... saw that I'm actually 2,5 hours late... Why does it have to be this way? Oh, I do remember time when I would get up just before my first alarm, and be glad that I am awake and eager to live through the day. When I was glad to see everyone and know that I do have a purpose... Every time I fall (or better say "throw myself", because I really do that intentionally) in love, everything is so much easier! I don't even get up - I awake sitting in my bed, staring at the watch, counting every second. And even if I do lay down again, it's not because I'm sleepy or tired, it's because I'm so overwhelmed by emotions that I can't stand or even sit straight! I miss that feeling. It was too long since the last time. Just as I predicted, I did not fall those last two times. It's good, it was not worth it, but it's also bad. Every time it's over, it is as if someone unplugs a power cable. I know I have a lot of power on my batteries and it won't harm to stay on my own for some time, to re-evaluate what happened, rethink everythink, recalculate, to make it better next time. But eventually, and always too soon, I run out of energy and everyday I wake up with more and more sad emotions and thoughts in my head. Or even worse, sometimes it's not sadness, but emptiness. post.title: Reasons to use IPFS
post.body:
<s>// will be moved as well</s> not worth it
## 1. Save Space
As you all know, sites on ZeroNet are shared between all users who access them. I'm not sure how not essential files work, so let's assume that all of the files are shared between all the users. That would mean that if you visit a blog to read some news, you would also need to DL all the data the site contains. Multipage sites are not popular on ZN, so you will have to DL all the content as soon as you enter the first page.
But in case of IPFS, you can specify what files to pin and what files will be automaticly deleted.

## 2. Save YOUR Space
In case of IPFS, you may decide to store NO data at all and use gateways provided for free. Ofcourse it harms decentralization and costs some power to those who host gateways, but this way you can watch films on your phone if you want to.

## 3. The same thing actually
Yes, to tell you the truth if creators of ZeroNet solve the problem with big files, there will be no need for IPFS here. But until then, you don't really have a choice ;D

## 4. DAG
The algorithm used in IPFS pervents the creation of copies of a same file. If a user is trying to upload a file that already exists on IPFS, it will be merged. (How awesome is that?!!)

# What I think
I think that guys should unite. ZN has great dynamic file sharing technology, IPFS is good at large static file transfer. Work together guys! Let's build that decentralized net you were talking about together! =D

post.title: The blog is UNdead (again)
post.body: I've fixed the blog and I think it's time to tell you my understandment of what has happened here. I belive it to be a bug: when user data limit is reached (see that little numbers near your comments? they have a tooltip!), he is temporary banned, until he eraces enough messages to be back under limit. Problem with my case was that the last comment I wrote was huge. And I suppose that caused a bug: site rejected my auth_key and I could not even delete my old comments. So if you ever get close to that 10 kb limit, tell me, I'll add some more space for you. The reason I got there so fast is... My emotional intability? Anyway, I post too much separate small comments. And because each comment is a json line with all the data like what post it's from and it's number etc., so it really does matter when I post 5 comments with 5 words in each... So I have to find a balance between limiting my freedom of "SpEeCh" and my readers' disk space saving. # How to fix? That's easy. As usually I was thinking in the right direction, but lack of skill was too great. 1. Open this file: ZeroNet/data/[site]/data/users/content.json 2. Find this: "permissions": { "banexample@zeroid.bit": false, "nofish@zeroid.bit": { "max_size": 20000 } 3. add a user you need, and the limit you wish to grant (don't forget that all the data is stored on every machine!!) 4. in case you already have the same error I had, either open user's folder / data,json and delete some messages, or just delete user's folder. 5. Sing and Share! 6. Tell others how to do that!! You may give this post's link, I guess =) # Wanna ask u smth So now I lost all my comments... GOTTA WRITE MORE! But!.. in order to find a less temporary solution, I am going to ask you to ask your questions on my zeromail. At least long questions. And surely offtopic questions go to the mail. Commenting posts is ok, it's cool, this way I know you read me, but let's not overdo again ;D ## Tip: In your comments youse citation (not only here, everywhere!), a short line or 2 words help in rebuilding a dialog when one user decides to erace his comments.

post.title: Streaming with IPFS: HowTo Pt.1
post.body: State: Ready? Share your opinion! Tell what to add! May be moved to a separate page! #SWIPFS HowTo Part1: Installation ## Get IPFS 1. Open https://ipfs.io/ 2. Click "Install IPFS" 3. Choose your OS and download a package # Install ## On Linux: 1. use install.sh 2. When completed, run in console: ipfs init ipfs daemon 3. U can start in on system start with no terminal open. (Cool! Use Linux!) ## On Windows: 1. Create a folder for IPFS and move ipfs.exe there 2. Add IPFS.exe to your PATH I. Press Win+Pause II. Advanced system parameters (–î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã) III. [smth] variables (–ü–∞—Ä–∞–º–µ—Ç—Ä—ã —Å—Ä–µ–¥—ã) Help me to translate this please! IV. Find PATH, push, select "Edit" V. Add your new folder which contains IPFS 3. Run CMD.EXE (Ctrl+R, CMD, Enter) 4. Run ipfs init ipfs daemon ### Note: On Windows you can't hide console. Keep it runnin'! (if you can, tell me how and I'll update this post) ##On Mac: 1. Buy me a Mac. 2. I'll send you detailed setup instructions OR 1. Buy me a real good Mac or MacBook. 2. I'll setup your Mac by TeamViewer # Add the file ##Console To add new files run in console: ipfs add [file] adds a file to IPFS. But it will be removed by a garbage collector in some time. To avoid that, pin the file! Pin a file: ipfs pin add [hash] tells GC not to delete the file You don't need to save the hash, because every time you write ipfs add, the hash is the same! Hail to Merkel-Dag! ##GUI Grafic User Interface is available. Search ipfs.io to find out where. Also it's written when you run ipfs daemon. ## READ the rest fot $5 in the [part 2](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiAFnnf6kb2G1GzDV1FhttTWNxCa4mShn/?Post:24:Streaming+with+IPFS:+HowTo,+Pt.2)!
